transcripts.text: And if you're already a believer with experiential knowledge, start reading this book without the lenses, without the religious glasses.  Take them off.  This book does a good job by itself.  An angel woke up my next guest with revelation about the next great move of God's spirit.  And my guest says the glory shows up now wherever he goes.

The Bible does a good job all by itself, but an angel needs to wake someone up from a sound sleep to reveal the next great move of God?  Hmm, very interesting.  Hello, BezelT3!  More than a few of you have asked about an update on the Oily Bible and the ongoing experiment of my own Oily Gospel of Judas that has been marinating in a small Tupperware container of plain old mineral oil since April of 2019.  Now it's been just about a year that my brother and I went down to Harbor Light Church in Costa Mesa, California to see the infamous Bible in a plastic vat for ourselves and we received a vial of this heavenly oil to boot.  So let me bring you an update.
